chunk:
Three Ships Brighter Days Red Algae + Avocado Biodegradable Eye Masks

Brand: Three Ships

Category: Around Eye Cream
book: 0544-Three Ships Brighter Days Red Algae + Avocado Biodegradable Eye Masks

chunk: Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Propanediol, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cellulose Gum, Sucrose, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Extract, Potassium Chloride, Allantoin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Xanthan Gum, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit
book: 0544-Three Ships Brighter Days Red Algae + Avocado Biodegradable Eye Masks

chunk: Sucrose, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Extract, Potassium Chloride, Allantoin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Xanthan Gum, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Calcium Lactate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate
book: 0544-Three Ships Brighter Days Red Algae + Avocado Biodegradable Eye Masks

chunk: Directions: Apply to clean skin and leave on for 10-20 minutes. Remove eye masks and gently pat any excess serum into skin. When finished, place the used hydrogels in warm-hot water for 10 minutes they ll dissolve and the water can simply be poured down the drain.
book: 0544-Three Ships Brighter Days Red Algae + Avocado Biodegradable Eye Masks

chunk: Mode d emploi: Appliquer sur une peau propre et laisser agir 10 20 minutes. Retirer les masques et tapoter doucement l exc s de s rum sur la peau. Placer ensuite les masques dans l eau chaude pendant 10 minutes ils vont se dissoudre et l eau peut tre vers e dans le drain.
book: 0544-Three Ships Brighter Days Red Algae + Avocado Biodegradable Eye Masks
